t: Ophelia Health Review 2025: Cost, Pros & Cons, & Who It’s Right For
s: Ophelia Health offers medication-assisted treatment (MAT) for opioid use disorder and related conditions, such as depression, anxiety, and insomnia. It earned 4 out of 5 stars in our independent review. Ophelia is available in select states, and all services are delivered entirely online.
